event.description: J. Downum flies out to left fielder Delmon Young.
Cory Jensen doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Delmon Young.
Mike Snyder strikes out swinging.
Austin Chubb grounds out, third baseman Miguel Cabrera to first baseman Prince Fielder.
